title: Bug 6410File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: The file is dirtied but not changed, and code assist does notappear.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not dirty the file.
SR: 1122.Open a Java file. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a methodcall. For example, consider "I" to be the cursor below:Object o = anotherObject.method(I);Press CtrlSpace.
